question: My uncircumcised 6-year-old son is having a frequent urge to urinate, however it seems it is due to clothing/underwear rubbing it.  He does not have painful urination, just a feeling that makes him often need to urinate, which is highly inconvenient during school, car trips, etc.  it does not appear to be a sugar/diabetes issue.  Would cortisone, etc. help?  Thanks so much!
title: Frequent urinatu
